titleNullable: HDB Resale Prices with MRT Details (1990 to Now)
subtitleNullable: HDB resale prices enriched with MRT Distance and more!
descriptionNullable:
### Context

Yes this is another dataset on the resale prices in Singapore from data.gov.sg. Yes it has been done to death, so why not give it another go?

What's different from other datasets is this has the coordinates of each address and the distance in meters to the nearest MRT station.

Information is mainly from data.gov.sg on the HDB resale prices taken on the tail end of 2021. The dataset is enriched with the coordinates from open street map and onemap.sg

### Content

Some address may be incorrect.


### Inspiration

Come and be the best property agent in Singapore!

### Updates

Version 5:
- Contains full set of data from the HDB resale flat prices in data.gov.sg
- Removed HDB blocks that was removed due to SERS exercise
- Geodata should be more accurate now
- Nearest MRT is also appended
- Calculation of the Nearest MRT distance and MRTs are affected by old lines (EW and NS) vs new lines (Circle line, etc) between pre2000 and post 2000

Version 6:
- Removed Other unnecessary files 
- Added in logic to amend address `MARINE CRES` to `MARINE CRESCENT VILLE` as  `MARINE CRES`  will pick up `SEMBCORP MARINE TUAS CRESCENT YARD`
title: HDB Resale Prices with MRT Details (1990 to Now)
subtitle: HDB resale prices enriched with MRT Distance and more!

### Context

Yes this is another dataset on the resale prices in Singapore from data.gov.sg. Yes it has been done to death, so why not give it another go?

What's different from other datasets is this has the coordinates of each address and the distance in meters to the nearest MRT station.

Information is mainly from data.gov.sg on the HDB resale prices taken on the tail end of 2021. The dataset is enriched with the coordinates from open street map and onemap.sg

Version 5:
- Contains full set of data from the HDB resale flat prices in data.gov.sg
- Removed HDB blocks that was removed due to SERS exercise
- Geodata should be more accurate now
- Nearest MRT is also appended
- Calculation of the Nearest MRT distance and MRTs are affected by old lines (EW and NS) vs new lines (Circle line, etc) between pre2000 and post 2000
